create.title: Static POAP Kiosk drop creation
create.note: Note: this is an internal POAP tool, anything you do here will not work unless it received preapproval from the engineering team.

drop_id.label: Drop ID
drop_id.info: The event ID of your drop, this can be found in the confirmation email

welcome_text.label: Welcome text
welcome_text.info: The welcome text above the email field

optin_text.label: Opt-in text (html)
optin_text.info: The opt in text displayed at POAP claim.

succes_screen.title: Creation success
succes_screen.second_line: 2. Ask for this drop to be approved.
succes_screen.third_line: 3. Print your physical QRS with the format: https://qr.poap.xyz/#/static/claim/CLAIM_CODE.
succes_screen.fourth_line: 4. Export emails after the event at https://qr.poap.xyz/#/static/admin/export.

validations.accept_terms: Accepteer de voorwaarden om door te gaan
validations.invalid_qr: Uw QR is ongeldig, scan deze opnieuw
validations.invalid_link: Je hebt een ongeldige link gescand, neem contact op met de organisator van het evenement.

user_claimed.title: Je hebt met succes je POAP geclaimd!
user_claimed.subtitle: Check je inbox op {{ email }}
user_claimed.description: De e-mail bevat instructies over hoe u uw POAP kunt bekijken en deze kunt claimen op een crypto-portemonnee als u dat wilt.
